channel.title: Uskaarj Troubleshooting Forum
channel.description: Have problems with the mod? Then post them in here for assistance.

item.title: USkaarj Download
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dakatsu)
item.dc:creator: Dakatsu
item.content:encoded: Hey, I used to play USkaarj 1 a lot, & really liked it, however, I cant seem to find the first USkaarj 1, I always find USkaarj 2k3/2k4, even on the downloads page of this site. Is there a download like I can use that is the real USkaarj 1?

item.title: My Uskaarj.bat file dont work at all!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (jazznaz89)
item.dc:creator: jazznaz89
item.content:encoded:
My Uskaarj.bat file doesnt work at all. i tried a fresh install of UT, and uskaarj and the patch, but still nothing. I really wanna play, but it aint working!!


Do i need to install the latest ut patch or the bonus paks or anything? im using UT:GOTY

item.title: HELP!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (FyreBall Starr)
item.dc:creator: FyreBall Starr
item.content:encoded: I click the umod, install it, then go into UT, how do i play it?

item.title: got it
item.author: invalid@example.com (MaSwIcK)
item.dc:creator: MaSwIcK
item.content:encoded: I fixed my prob with the install. The .umod file had the UT icon on it and it wouldn't start install and I tryed to change the program it should run with but I couldn't find the ut setup.. So I reinstalled the game added with the patch and everything, then I went to change the program on the umod and there in the list on Recommended Programs I could now see "Setup". I used setup and now it works fine

item.title: cant install please help!
item.author: invalid@example.com (MaSwIcK)
item.dc:creator: MaSwIcK
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I had this installed before and I uninstalled it. And now I wanted to play it again, but I cant run the umod file :S
I have unreal Tournament installed along with another mod aswell.

please help

item.title: Total newbie question
item.author: invalid@example.com (Last)
item.dc:creator: Last
item.content:encoded:
How do I install Uskaarj? Please help!

How do I install Uskaarj? I run the umod, I make a seperate folder, and place it all in there, but I'm clueless as to where I put that folder, or how to run it, someone help me please

item.title: Mining
item.author: invalid@example.com (akiuspaladin)
item.dc:creator: akiuspaladin
item.content:encoded: I have no idea how to mine. I tried to attack the crystal thing with a miner but nothing happens. Sometimes they kill themselves. How do you do it?

item.title: USkaarj.bat doesent work
item.author: invalid@example.com (Krycek360)
item.dc:creator: Krycek360
item.content:encoded:
When i try to opean the USkaarj.bat file i get regular ut?
IS .bat windows only if so is there another way i can play uskaarj?

item.title: USkaarj.bat Doesnt start :( help PLEASE
item.author: invalid@example.com (DaDawn)
item.dc:creator: DaDawn
item.content:encoded:
Hi all my USkaarjJ.bat dont start !

I install the ut mod and install it in C:\Ut2003 ans want to start the
USkaarjJ.bat but there is a black screen SHORT and then its away and nothing happens i olso restartet the pc Please help me
